snippet.title: Karakuri-kun Official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1539250


📗Story
Join Karakuri-kun on her adventure to learn Japanese culture and history.
You play as an automaton robot built by a toy maker and brought to life.

📜Japanese History
In an RPG setting you will learn an overview of Japanese history and learn some important players of Japan's past, such as:

Miyamoto Musashi
Oda Nobunaga
The Edo Period of Japan



Splash Screen voiceover by the lovely Christina Costello - https://twitter.com/its_tina_timeVO

Consider subscribing for more games
#youtubegaming #rpg #videogames
